text: Kovardy () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Kovardinsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 818 as of 2010. There are 9 streets. == Geography == It is located 61 km from Krasnousolsky. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Kovardy
